title: Can't start the game. "Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information."
body: New player here, the first time I try to start up the game,  I get "Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information." and then the progress bar resets to zero. The farthest I got was eight percent before that message popped up. Any solutions? I'm playing on windows ten.

replies.body: Welcome to league!  It sucks you're getting stuck here, but I'd like to help and get you in-game!  If you're only getting up to 8% before receiving the error, then something with your PC might be blocking the patcher from scanning your game files.  You'll want to run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i also been having this problem 6 years of playing i get this window everytime i turn on the game and after a match has ended. but its not game breaking for me.
